emitSchema.description: Defines if the schema is going to be emitted for this segment

segmentName.description: Segment name, for the root segment it's an empty string

segmentType.description: Defines if the segment is a regular segment or an OpenAPI Mixin

forceApiRoot.description: Force API root URL for this segment, overrides the global one

controllers.description: List of controllers as key-value pairs for fast access

rpcModuleName.description: RPC name that's going to be used in the client

originalControllerName.description: Original name of the controller class

forceApiRoot.description: Force API root URL for this RPC module, overrides the global one

handlers.description: List of handlers as key-value pairs for fast access

path.description: Endpoint that's concatenated with the prefix

validation.description: Validation for body, query, params, output and iteration

custom.description: Custom data that can be defined by a custom decorator
